    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(Player player, int placingCardId, int tableCardId, CornerPos tableCornerPos, CornerPos placingCornerPos, Side placingCardSide) throws PlacingOnHiddenCornerException, CardNotPlacedException, CardNotOnBoardException
      Funzion for plaicing a card on the player board
      Parameters:
      player - Player who is playcing the card
      placingCardId - Card to place
      tableCardId - Card on the table to be connected to
      tableCornerPos - Corner position of the table card for the connection
      placingCornerPos - Corner posizion of the hand card for the connection
      placingCardSide - Side of the playing card
      Throws:
      PlacingOnHiddenCornerException - The corner is hidden
      CardNotPlacedException
      CardNotOnBoardException
